MAN.TITLE: unix_x
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: shell (sh) command execution, output redirected to a window

DESCRIPTION.P: Sends a string cmd to Unix for execution by the sh shell. The standard output is redirected to a window. Unix execution errors are trapped; *NOTE* that only the last shell command error is reported when a list of command separated by ";" is sent: this is not recommended.

MAN.EXAMPLE: if MSDOS then unix_x("dir "+WSCI+"\demos"); else unix_x("ls $SCI/demos"); end
